DumpMergeInput.description: dump control for hdr input raw, convert to jpg

AdjustEv0.description: improve the brightness of ev0, range is -2 to 2

EVLastGain.description: enable range is 16 to 1, 0 - disable, suggest 3.0

saturationValue.description: saturation enhance strength,range 0 to 0.2, suggest 0.1, 0 is no enhance , 0.2 is most enhanced

ClipThresh.description: ClipThresh range is 0-1.0, control the clip value.

fBrightTh.description: brightTh range is 0.1-0.9, only correct pixel bright than threshold

i32CyanCorrectStrength.description: the range is 0 - 32000, control the correct strength.

i32defalutGammaTab.description: the gamma table is copy from the most bright part gamma lut in ipe gamma

i32defalutPortraitGammaTab.description: the Portrait gamma table is copy from the most bright part gamma lut in ipe gamma

f32SNModeOverExpTH.description: control over exposure ratio at sn mode, luxSeg: 0~250 250~380 380~, and threshold range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32FastSNModeOverExpTH.description: control over exposure ratio at fastsn mode, luxSeg: 0~250 250~380 380~, and threshold range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32HDRModeOverExpTH.description: control over exposure ratio at hdr mode, luxSeg: 0~250 250~380 380~, and threshold range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32LLHDRModeOverExpTH.description: control over exposure ratio at llhdr mode, luxSeg: 0~250 250~380 380~, and threshold range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32HDRLiteModeOverExpTH.description: control over exposure ratio at hdrlite mode, luxSeg: 0~250 250~380 380~, and threshold range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32SNModeOverExpMotionSens.description: range is [0, 1], the higher the value, the harder to delete frame, default value is 1.0f.

i32PatchMatchMappingModeByLumaShade.description: 0: close mapping, 1: clip image maxvalue to 16383

fOverExpMotionPortraitTh.description: range is [0, 1], control portrait scene choose motion mode, default value is 0.125f.

fOverExpMotionNormalTh.description: range is [0, 1], control nonportrait scene choose motion mode, default value is 0.32f.

UseInpaintingBayerOrRGB.description: default is 0, 0: inpainting run in kRGGB bayer pattern, 1: inpainting run in RGB pattern

f32MaxLab.description: control face max bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32MinLab.description: control face min bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32HalfMinLab.description: control face halfmin bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

FaceDiffAdjust.description: control Face Contrast, luxSeg: 0~200 200~280 280~350 350~, and enhanceRatio range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32MaxLab.description: control face max bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32MinLab.description: control face min bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32HalfMinLab.description: control face halfmin bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

FaceDiffAdjust.description: control Face Contrast, luxSeg: 0~200 200~280 280~350 350~, and enhanceRatio range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32MaxLab.description: control face max bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32MinLab.description: control face min bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32HalfMinLab.description: control face halfmin bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32MinLab.description: control face min bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32MinLab.description: control face min bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32HalfMinLab.description: control face halfmin bright in lab domain, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

FaceDiffAdjust.description: control Face Contrast, luxSeg: 0~200 200~280 280~350 350~, and enhanceRatio range is 0.0 to 1.0.

f32PortraitAdjust.description: Degree of portrait adjustment,range from 0(No adjust) to 1000(Max adjust)

f32ContrastLevel.description: Degree of face contrast level, range from 0 (No adjust) to 1 (Max adjust)

f32ChromaLevel.description: Degree of face skin tone chroma, range from 0 (Low chroma) to 1 (High chroma)

f32PortraitAdjust.description: Degree of portrait adjustment,range from 0(No adjust) to 1000(Max adjust)

f32ContrastLevel.description: Degree of face contrast level, range from 0 (No adjust) to 1 (Max adjust)

f32ChromaLevel.description: Degree of face skin tone chroma, range from 0 (Low chroma) to 1 (High chroma)

f32ContrastLevel.description: Degree of face contrast level, range from 0 (No adjust) to 1 (Max adjust)

f32ChromaLevel.description: Degree of face skin tone chroma, range from 0 (Low chroma) to 1 (High chroma)

f32ColorCorrection.description: control corlor correction strength, range is 1.0 to 2.0.

f32GlobalBeta.description: control gtm strength, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32LocalBeta.description: control ltm strength, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

f32LceBeta.description: control lce strength, range is 0.1 to 0.9.

i32LtmDarkTh.description: pixel in gamma space darker than this value is dark area, default value is 25.

i32LtmShadowTh.description: pixel in gamma space between darkth and shadingth is shadow area

i32LtmHighLightTh.description: pixel in gamma space brighter than highlight area is highlight area

i32LtmLtmblockNum.description: divide the the whole img into n*n blcoks when ltm

i32LtmLceblockNum.description: divide the the whole img into n*n blcoks when lce

f32LtmExtremDarkRatio.description: if the dark area percent bigger than the threshold, means the scene is too dark, the value should in [0.9, 1)

f32LtmExtremBrightRatio.description: if the highlight area is bigger than the threshold, means the scene is too bright, , the value should in [0.9, 1)

Outdoor.description: the pixel darkTh will mapping to is cal by slope * darkPercent + bias

f32DarkAreaGamma.description: Increase dark area bright, the range is 1.0f to 2.4f, bigger gamma, will get brighter dark area

Outdoor.description: the pixel darkTh will mapping to is cal by slope * darkPercent + bias

f32DarkAreaGamma.description: Increase dark area bright, the range is 1.0f to 2.4f, bigger gamma, will get brighter dark area

Outdoor.description: the pixel darkTh will mapping to is cal by slope * darkPercent + bias

f32DarkAreaGamma.description: Increase dark area bright, the range is 1.0f to 2.4f, bigger gamma, will get brighter dark area

Outdoor.description: the pixel darkTh will mapping to is cal by slope * darkPercent + bias

f32DarkAreaGamma.description: Increase dark area bright, the range is 1.0f to 2.4f, bigger gamma, will get brighter dark area

GlareAreParam.description: Glare are is defined as over exposure part of the ev0, only need to set bias.

FaceAeParam.description: In face scene, need to turn down the backGround brightness to improve contrast.
